message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $110. It's a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to consider your offer, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $105. I'm willing to make a slight concession and sell it to you for $115. It's a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit higher than $115. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $108?

I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to consider your offer, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $108. I'm willing to make another slight concession and sell it to you for $112. It's a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable going above $108. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $108?
